Text: Clinical laboratories market is estimated to reach USD 496.0 million by 2024. Growth is attributed to increased need for regulatory compliance in developing markets such as China, India, and Eastern Europe.
Cause: Growth is attributed to increased need for regulatory compliance in developing markets such as China, India, and Eastern Europe.
Effect: Clinical laboratories market is estimated to reach USD 496.0 million by 2024.
